isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - SUN SHADE

svcsubproc.title: Remove Sun Shade on Daycab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 17 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove self-tapping screws (Item 1) attaching both right and left side sun shade clearance lights (Items 2 and 3) and center sun shade clearance light (Item 4) to sun shade (Item 5). Lay self-tapping screws out of the way and save for installation.

Pull right and left side sun shade clearance lights (Items 2 and 3) and center sun shade clearance light (Item 4) out of sun shade (Item 5) (they will hang free from wiring harness) to gain access to sun shade hex flanged head mounting screws (Item 6).

Reach through clearance light openings and remove three hex flanged head mounting screws (Item 6) attaching sun shade (Item 5) to the sun shade mounting bracket (Item 7), which is bonded to daycab roof (Item 8). Lay hex flanged head mounting screws out of the way and save for installation.

note.para: There are 3 sun shade mounting seals (Item 9) between sun shade and each mounting bracket, if they are loose when pulling sun shade from the mounting brackets, retrieve them and save for installation.

step1.para: Pull sun shade (Item 5) away from sun shade mounting bracket (Item 7) until wiring harness connector (Item 10) is pulled through wiring harness hole (Item 11) in sun shade mounting bracket. Disconnect sun shade connector (Item 12) from wiring harness connector and remove sun shade. Place sun shade on clean, dry surface to keep it from getting scratched or damaged.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Sun Shade on Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 18 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove self-tapping screws (Item 1) attaching both right and left side sun shade clearance lights (Items 2 and 3) and center sun shade clearance light (Item 4) to sun shade (Item 5). Lay self-tapping screws out of the way and save for installation.

Pull right and left side sun shade clearance lights (Items 2 and 3) and center sun shade clearance light (Item 4) out of sun shade (Item 5) (they will hang free from wiring harness) to gain access to sun shade hex flanged head mounting screws (Item 6).

Reach through clearance light openings and remove three hex flanged head mounting screws (Item 6) attaching sun shade (Item 5) to the three sun shade mounting brackets (Item 7), which are attached to sleeper cab roof (Item 9) by bonding adhesive and blind rivets (Item 8). Lay hex flanged head mounting screws out of the way and save for installation.

note.para: There are 3 sun shade mounting seals (Item 10) between sun shade and each mounting bracket, if they are loose when pulling sun shade from the mounting brackets, retrieve them and save for installation.

step1.para: Pull sun shade (Item 5) away from three sun shade mounting brackets (Item 7) until wiring harness connector (Item 11) is pulled through wiring harness hole (Item 12) in center sun shade mounting bracket. Disconnect sun shade connector (Item 13) from wiring harness connector and remove sun shade. Place sun shade on clean, dry surface to keep it from getting scratched or damaged.
